attributes.title: =if([$Progress] == 1,'',if([$TaskDue]>addDays(@now,-1),if([$TaskStart]>addDays(@now,-1),if([$Progress]>0,'',''),if([$Progress]*100>=floor(((@now-[$TaskStart])/([$TaskDue]-[$TaskStart]))*100) || [$TaskType] == 'Milestone' ,'','This item is below target progress!')),'This item is running late!'))
